item.title: Install Powershell 7 on Wsl and Ubuntu
item.author: contact@saggiehaim.net (Saggie Haim)
item.description: With PowerShell 7, we get the best PowerShell edition, most importantly, it’s cross-platform! While last time we installed the latest PowerShell 7 on a container, sometimes we don’t want just a plain environment with PowerShell, sometimes we want a to add other tools, change system configurations or use different Linux Distros. That is why we use WSL. What is WSL? WSL or Windows Subsystem for Linux is a feature that lets us run full Linux distributions on top of our Windows OS without the overhead of running virtualization tools.
